title: ChartEasy for US Healthcare Providers
subtitle: Application Developer / Fullstack Developer
description: At Theoria Medical, I worked as a Mid-level Application Developer primarily in Billings and Payments team where I improved the external data extraction pipeline by adding strict validation, retry logic, and better error handling—reducing invalid data by 99% and cutting manual review work by over 50%. I automated high-volume recurring tasks using Google Apps Script, Python, and mongosh, lowering operational workload by 95%. I also built and parsed HL7 message payloads for billing, insurance, and patient-information systems while adhering to HIPAA requirements, and collaborated with data engineers, QA testers, and data analyst teams to resolve data inconsistencies and enhance overall microservice reliability.

title: Chirp AI Sales Assistant
subtitle: Fullstack Developer
description: Worked across the stack to build API connectors for Hubspot, Salesforce, and calendar services, powering multi-source lead enrichment. Improved lead qualification by integrating OpenAI APIs with custom data scrapers. Helped maintain and enhance microservices, shipping features like a multi-step onboarding flow that boosted user activation. Also dove into AWS tools to diagnose and fix critical production issues.

title: FixTman Website, ERP & Technician Web Apps
subtitle: Fullstack Developer • DevOps
description: Led the development of key backend systems, including an admin dashboard with user access controls and centralized logging for better system visibility. Built real-time chat and notifications for technicians, streamlined the booking system with advanced pricing logic, and integrated third-party services through APIs and webhooks. Also contributed to CI/CD automation and collaborated closely with frontend teams across web and mobile platforms.

title: SalBaek Technologies Projects
subtitle: Fullstack Developer • IT Support • DevOps
description: Developed “STEPv5,” Sal-Tech’s internal ERP system, enabling seamless management of company data, product listings, and file storage. Replaced the need for remote server connections by integrating secure, browser-based file access. Also built additional tools, including an events management site using WordPress.

title: Pandemification
subtitle: Senior Thesis • Lead Developer
description: A Gamified learning platform that helps student tackle introductory programming with use of game elements such as leaderboards, badges, etc.

title: Plague Invasion
subtitle: Pet Project • Lead Developer
description: A 2D side-scrolling roguelike-style game where players must navigate through a procedurally generated world while avoiding obstacles and enemies.
